@@ -1,13 +1,255 @@ - + - - - - Document + + + Gravity Shop + + + + + -

Hello world!

+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+
+

Work around you and your team

+

From ads that dance or sing to MTV-like commercials, online advertisers are now using a new type of technology “rich media” to attract consumers.

+ GET STARTED +
+ 01 +
+
+ 03 +
+
+
+ +
+
+ +
+
+ +
+
+ +
+
+

We solve digital problems with an outstanding creative flare

+

The best time to view the moon, obviously, is at night when there are few clouds and the weather is accommodating for a long and lasting study.

+

For most of us, the idea of astronomy is something we directly connect to “stargazing”, telescopes and seeing magnificent displays in the heavens.

+
+ +
+

Denis Shepovalov

+

Co-founder & CEO

+ +
+ +
+
+
+
+
+

—SERVICES

+
+ +
+

We love work hard and explore new things that’s why we cover lot of things. Check our service list and view details

+

body:
It shouldn't be more than one <main> element on the page https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/main
You could use another container tag.

body: Remember that the `heading` tags doesn't mean "big text" or "important text", they mean a "Title" of a section of the page. Here, the name of the CEO is not a title.

body: Be careful using the headings tags. Here, which is the title with higher priority "Services" ir "We love..." ? It seems to me that the title of the section is "Services" so that line should be a higher H tag.

body: When a clickable element doesn't link you to another page or another section of the document it is better to use a "button" tag. You can style them exactly the same way. Check this article: https://bitsofco.de/anchors-vs-buttons/

body: The `strong` tag is used to emphasise some text. When the whole text is a `strong` it could lose semantic meaning. Remember than 'bold' text is achieved through CSS.
